data.name: Happy Guy : Memories
data.detailed_description: This DLC add 2 animated scenes for each girl character. Enter the Extra screen to visit adult scenes.
data.about_the_game: This DLC add 2 animated scenes for each girl character. Enter the Extra screen to visit adult scenes.
data.short_description: This DLC add Live2d animated scenes into the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
All characters are over 18 years old.
